title.narrative: Honduras Education Quality, Governance, & Institutional Strengthening

description.narrative: The objective of the Project is to support the Recipient to increase the coverage, quality, accountability and governance of its basic education system.

condition.narrative: Requires depositing the entire amount of fundsIDA-financed and counterpart, into the newly established pension fund for PROHECOteachers.

Requires the Government to amend the PROHECO Debt Payment Agreement, in a manner satisfactory to the Association, to establish theamount of the debt that the Government of Honduras, through SEFIN, shall pay to INPREMA accounting for the specific entitlements ofeach PROHECO teacher employed from March 1, 1999 to January 31, 2012.

Requires the Government to determine the entitlements for each PROHECO teacher with respects to the pension payments that suchteacher and the employer have made since March 1, 1999, all in a manner satisfactory to the Association.
Requires the Government to identify each individual PROHECO teacher who is entitled to pension funds and the amount owed to eachteacher.
Requires the Governmente to establish an acceptable pension fund for PROHECO teachers.

The Government of Honduras, through SEFIN and SEDUC, shall exercise its rights and carry out its obligations under the PROHECOAffiliation Agreement and the PROHECO Debt Payment Agreement, in a manner satisfactory to the Assocation.

title.narrative: Number of schools with Transparency School Boards deployed in the 12 targeted departments

comment.narrative: 78% of the agreed incremental target has been already reached

title.narrative: Number of PROHECO teachers trained in the usage of multi-grade didactic materials

comment.narrative: 87% of the agreed incremental target has been already reached

title.narrative: Number of new CCEPREBs opened and functioning with adequate school supplies

comment.narrative: 92% of the agreed incremental target has been already reached
96% of the agreed incremental target has been already reached.

title.narrative: Increased 6th grade Gross Completion Rates in PROHECO schools

comment.narrative: 98% of the agreed incremental target has been reached

title.narrative: Number of school networks with PERs (that draw on school PECs) developed in the 12 departments targeted.

comment.narrative: Activity in progress. 47% of the revised target has been reached.

title.narrative: Number of workshops organized to disseminate information related to the PROHECO teachers' pension benefits and rights

comment.narrative: Activity in progress. Four workshops were implemented. As a result of these 3,000 out of approx. 6,000 teachers have beenaffiliated to INPREMA.

title.narrative: Number of operational manuals on the preparation and monitoring of PECs and PERs distributed to school networks in the 12 targeted departments
Staff from DIGECE and other relevant technical units of SEDUC trained in using information from learning assessment to monitor performance, feedback into policy making and results dissemination

comment.narrative: Personnel trained and certified in the Stallings instrument for effective use of classroom instructional time.

title.narrative: Integrated system for community-based school management developed and implemented in all school networks in the 12 departments targeted and linked to the central level web-based EMIS

comment.narrative: Preparatory activities for reaching this target completed.

title.narrative: Promoters and coordinators of PROHECO program trained in financial management and recording capabilities at the AECO level

comment.narrative: Target was doubled with 211 more people trained during the last 6 months, in order to accommodate turnover rates of PROHECOpersonnel since 2009, when the first batch of 258 promoters and coordinators was trained.

title.narrative: Number of PROHECO schools receiving the packages of didactic material adapted to the National Curriculum, including textbooks and teacher workbooks, in Natural and Social Sciences.

comment.narrative: The target has been reached already. A total of 2,748 PROHECO schools, 317 of which are EIB, received the package of educationalmaterials.

title.narrative: Number of new CCEPREB volunteers trained

comment.narrative: The target has been reached already. As of today, a total of 1234 CCEPREB volunteers has been trained, of which 559 are EIBteachers.

title.narrative: Percentage of PROHECO schools that report through the PROHECO module of SEDUC’s web portal information about enrollment, teacher absenteeism and number of school days
Increased proportion of complaints submitted to SEDUC’s Transparency Unit made through Transparency School Boards.
Increased preschool enrollment in targeted areas

comment.narrative: 98% of the agreed incremental target has been reached

title.narrative: Development and Implementation of a web based Education Management and Information System (EMIS)

target.value: System fully operational with updated information from 100% of departments

actual.value: Some information subsystems have been developed and the strategy to integrate them into one information system is under discussion

title.narrative: HRM system strengthened and SIARHD fully migrated to the SIAFI and fully decentralized to all 18 departments of the country

baseline.value: Undifferentiated lines of authority, responsibility, information and execution across the central level and between central anddepartmental levels.

target.value: Valid system of payroll integrity, SIARHD fully migrated to SIAFI

actual.value: 80% of SIARHD migrated to SIAFI, but still with problems and deficiencies in terms of data transmission and security.
